title: Harry and Meghan's new Netflix series isn't doing what they think it's doing
description: Top new Netflix show “Harry & Meghan” features Duchess of Sussex Meghan Markle and the prince's wedding photos and royal texts. But it's all in the past.

title: Stop buying Christmas gifts for people who say they want 'nothing'
description: Buying a Christmas present for someone who has said they don't want one makes the gift-giving process more about the giver and less about the receiver.

title: Tens of thousands of dollars hang in the balance for borrowers awaiting Supreme Court decision
description: More than 40 million borrowers like Joy Morales-Bartlett were eligible to cancel up to $20,000 in federal student loan debt under Pres. Joe Biden’s one-time student loan forgiveness plan.

title: Sinema's an independent because both Democrats and Republicans don't like her
description: Arizona Senator Kyrsten Sinema makes Joe Biden and the Democrat's life harder by becoming an independent. She's no John McCain.
